media:group.media:title: Puzzling degrees of freedom
media:group.media:description:
Clarification: for the “two rotational degrees of freedom” question, the rotations should all fix a common center point. Otherwise the solution for two degrees of freedom is already a solution.

Thanks to Bram Cohen for asking a question that led to this puzzle.

Go check out Mr.Puzzle's YouTube channel (https://www.youtube.com/c/MrPuzzle). I am flattering his spoiler break screen extremely sincerely.

Shapeways: http://shpws.me/SY2F
